caption.p: Microbial biofilm development of E. coli ( left) and S. aureus ( right) after different incubation periods with PLA/Fe 3O 4@EG coatings, expressed as CFU/mL values reflecting number of viable cells imbedded in biofilms. * p < 0.05; ** p < 0.01; *** p < 0.001 (CFU/mL values of control vs. PLA/Fe 3O 4@EG coatings).
